meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! It's your boy back with another review that's gonna make you wanna lace up those Vans and hit the streets (or in this case, the virtual skate park)!

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 is like a warm hug for old-school gamers who grew up with Tony Hawk's legendary gaming franchise. It's a masterclass in remastering, folks! Vicarious Visions did an amazing job of taking those classic games from the PlayStation era and bringing them into the modern age without losing any of that good ol' nostalgia.

Now, I know what you're thinking - "Is it just a rehash of old games?" Well, let me tell you, it's so much more than that! The gameplay is still as smooth as ever, with those satisfying combos and tricks that'll keep you coming back for more. And don't even get me started on the soundtrack - it's like a greatest hits album for skate punk rock!

But what really sets Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 apart is its ability to balance old-school charm with modern sensibilities. You've got new features, new music, and even online multiplayer! And yet, it still manages to retain that timeless spirit that made the original games so beloved.

Now, I'm not gonna lie - some critics are saying that it's a bit on the safe side, but honestly, who doesn't love a good ol' fashioned skate fest? It's like the gaming equivalent of a warm summer day, bro!

So there you have it, folks - Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 is a must-play for anyone who grew up with these games or just wants to experience that same rush of excitement. Trust me, this one's gonna be a classic!
